manipulators.description: command + equal + delete = delete rest of line
option + equal + delete = delete a word after
Tap Command_L (⌘) → Switch input source to English  |  短按左 Command (⌘) → 切换到英文输入法
Tap Command_R (⌘) → Switch input source to Chinese  |  短按右 Command (⌘) → 切换到中文输入法

rules.description: Launch Apps by F1. F8 F9 F10 F11 for debug in chrome. F12 desktop [ysq].

manipulators.description: option + k = move line up in VSCode
option + j = move line down in VSCode
equal + delete = delete rest of line
command + n = delete ahead of line
幕布上移一行: option+up = cmd+shift+up
幕布下移一行: option+down = cmd+shift+down
